Name: BoreMax
Description:
Manufacturer: Thermyte Concern
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Laser Instability: -70%
Cluster Modifier: 30%

Resistance: 10%

The BoreMax helps focus laser power to reduce instability significantly, while also keeping clusters of valuable deposits together upon shattering. While it does make it more difficult and time-consuming to bypass the deposit's resistance, most miners find the extra safety and increased yield worth the extra effort.

Manufacturer Warning! Using more than one mining gadget per deposit can result in a catastrophic explosion.
